Method Detail

getInstance

public static EasyDao getInstance()
获取默认的JNDI键名对应的EasyDao对象.

Returns:
返回EasyDao对象, 该对象将采用默认的JNDI键值, 即'jndiName'及其对应值获取数据库连接

getInstance

public static EasyDao getInstance(java.lang.String jndiKey)
获取指定JNDI键名对应的EasyDao对象

Parameters:
jndiKey - 指定的配置文件中的某个JNDI键
Returns:
返回EasyDao对象, 该对象将采用指定的JNDI键值获取数据库连接

getDBType

public abstract java.lang.String getDBType()
获取数据库类型

Returns:
数据库类型,如'mysql', 'oracle'

beginTrans

public void beginTrans()
                throws BaseException
开启事务。 支持嵌套事务，需要与endTrans(boolean)成对使用。 Gets a database connection and begin a transaction. Only when transCount is 0, will the transaction start. This method supports for nested transaction with method endTrans().

Throws:
BaseException
See Also:
endTrans(boolean)

endTrans

public void endTrans(boolean commit)
              throws BaseException
结束事务。 支持嵌套事务，需要与beginTrans()成对使用。 Ends a database transaction and close the database connection. Only when transCount is 1, will the transaction end. This method supports for nested transaction with method beginTrans().

Parameters:
commit - If true, commit the transaction, else rollback the transaction.
Throws:
BaseException
See Also:
beginTrans()

save

public int save(BaseEntity entity)
         throws BaseException
插入一条记录。 Persist the given entity instance, Inserts one data into database.

Parameters:
entity - BaseEntity object which need to be persisted.
Returns:
the row count for INSERT
Throws:
BaseException

save

public int[] save(BaseEntity[] entityArray)
           throws BaseException
批量插入多条记录。 注意: 1.参数Entity数组中列值的存放结构必须一致，即:数组中的某列要么都需要写入，要么都不需要写入！ 2.此方法不支持大字段列(e.g.BLOB/CLOB)的写入. Persist the given entity instances, Inserts multiple rows of data into database.

Parameters:
entityArray - the array of BaseEntity object which need to be persisted.
Returns:
an array of INSERT counts containing one element for each BaseEntity object in the parameter array. The elements of the array are ordered according to the order of the parameter array.
Throws:
BaseException

update

public int update(BaseEntity entity)
           throws BaseException
以参数entity中的主键值为条件, 更新一条记录.
Updates one record, the updating criteria is the primary key contained in the entity.

Parameters:
entity - BaseEntity object which data will override the old data in the database.
Returns:
the row count for UPDATE
Throws:
BaseException

update

public int[] update(BaseEntity[] entityArray)
             throws BaseException
以参数entityArray中各元素对应实体的主键值为条件, 批量更新多条记录. * 注意: 1.参数Entity数组中列值的存放结构必须一致，即:数组中的某列要么都需要更新，要么都不需要更新！ 2.此方法不支持大字段列(e.g.BLOB/CLOB)的写入.
Updates records by batch, the updating criteria is the primary key contained in the elements of entity array.

Parameters:
entityArray - the array of BaseEntity object which data will override the old data in the database.
Returns:
an array of UPDATE counts containing one element for each BaseEntity object in the parameter array. The elements of the array are ordered according to the order of the parameter array.
Throws:
BaseException

update

public int update(BaseEntity entity,
                  Criteria criteria)
           throws BaseException
指定criteria为条件或更新范围，以参数entity中的数据项更新相应表的记录。 注意：如果参数entity装载有文件类型的数据，或者说需要向某个表的大字段列(e.g.BLOB/CLOB)写入数据， 则参数criteria必须含有主键值以唯一标识需要更新的那条记录。
Updates some records, Using the property values in the entity to override correponding columns of records.
This method support updating for BLOB/CLOB column, but when you call this method and need writing data to BLOB/CLOB column,the criteria must contain the primary key value.

Parameters:
entity - BaseEntity object which data will override the old data in the database.
criteria - Criteria object which is the criteria of updating.
Returns:
the row count for UPDATE
Throws:
BaseException

updateAll

public int updateAll(BaseEntity entity)
              throws BaseException
以参数entity中的数据项更新相应表的所有记录。
Updates all records, Using the property values in the entity to override correponding columns of all records.

Parameters:
entity - BaseEntity object which data will override the old data in the database.
Returns:
the row count for UPDATE
Throws:
BaseException

             throws BaseException

Parameters:
entityArray - the array of BaseEntity which need to be delete.
Returns:
an array of DELETE counts containing one element for each BaseEntity object in the parameter array. The elements of the array are ordered according to the order of the parameter array.
Throws:
BaseException

Returns:

BaseException

exec

public int exec(java.lang.String eSql)
         throws BaseException
执行给定的SQL语句. 注意：此方法不支持大字段列(e.g.BLOB/CLOB)的写入. Executes the given sql. Notice, this method doesn't support writing BLOB/CLOB column.

Parameters:
eSql - the executed sql, such as: "INSERT INTO TABLEX(COLUMN1,COLUMN2) VALUES(1,'aa')
Returns:
the row count for INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE
Throws:
BaseException

exec

public int exec(java.lang.String pSql,
                SqlParamMap paramMap)
         throws BaseException
执行给定的SQL语句. 注意：此方法不支持大字段列(e.g.BLOB/CLOB)的写入. Executes the given sql. Notice, this method doesn't support writing BLOB/CLOB column.

Parameters:
pSql - the parameterize sql, such as: "INSERT INTO TABLEX(COLUMN1,COLUMN2) VALUES(?,?)
paramMap - SqlParamMap object, which loads the prameter values for the sql.
Returns:
the row count for INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE
Throws:
BaseException

exec

public int[] exec(java.lang.String pSql,
                  SqlParamMap[] paramMapArray)
           throws BaseException
执行给定的SQL。 注意：该方法不支持对大字段列(e.g. BLOB/CLOB)的写入。 Executes the given sql. Notice, this method doesn't support writing BLOB/CLOB column.

Parameters:
pSql - parameterized sql, such as: "INSERT INTO TABLEX(COLUMN1,COLUMN2) VALUES(?,?)
paramMapArray - the array of SqlParamMap object.
Returns:
an array of INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE counts containing one element for each SqlParamMap object in the parameter array. The elements of the array are ordered according to the order of the parameter array.
Throws:
BaseException

loadByPK

public boolean loadByPK(BaseEntity entity)
                 throws BaseException
根据参数entity中的主键值, 装载相应实体, 即加载该实体的其它属性. Loads one data to the entity by the primary key that contained in the entity.

Parameters:
entity - BaseEntity object which contains the values of primary key.
Returns:
true, only when exists the record which matching the primary key; otherwise fase;
Throws:
BaseException

Parameters:
entityClass - Class object which represented the table, such as 'Book.class'.
criteria - the criteria of query.
Throws:
BaseException

entityClass - the Class object of BaseEntity which loads the query results.
Throws:

get

public java.util.ArrayList get(java.lang.String pSql,
                               SqlParamMap paramMap,
                               java.lang.Class entityClass)
                        throws BaseException
根据给定的参数化SQL及相关参数值，从参数entityClas所表示的表或视图(包括无名视图)中取一条或多条记录.
Gets some datas from the talbe(or view) specified by the 'entityClass'.

Parameters:
pSql - parameterized sql, such as: "SELECT A.NAME,A.TYPE FROM TABLEX * WHERE A.NAME = ? "
paramMap - the SqlParamMap object, which associates the specified value with the specified '?' in the parameterized sql.
entityClass - the Class object of BaseEntity which loads the query results.
Throws:
BaseException

get

public PageList get(java.lang.String eSql,
                    java.lang.Class entityClass,
                    int startPos,
                    int endPos)
             throws BaseException
本方法将给定的SQL包装成分页查询SQL, 再通过分页查询SQL取得某段范围(大于等于startPos, 且小于endPos)内的一条或多条记录. 注意：不允许在SQL的WHERE子句中出现某列与子查询返回结果相比较的语句， 例如下面两种类型的SQL是禁用的:
1.SELECT A.COL_1, A.COL_2 FROM A WHERE A.COL_1 = (SELECT B.COL FROM B )
2.SELECT A.COL_1, A.COL_2 FROM A WHERE A.COL_1 IN (SELECT B.COL FROM B ).
请将上面两种被禁用的SQL改成如下形式, 即用EXISTS语句代替子条件语句: 1.SELECT A.COL_1, A.COL_2 FROM A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM B WHERE A.COL_1 =B.COL FROM B )
Decrates the given sql to pager sql, according the pager sql, gets pesistent data which position is between startPos and endPos (greater than or equals startPos, and less than endPos).

Parameters:
eSql - executable sql, such as: "SELECT A.NAME,A.TYPE FROM TABLEXX WHERE A.NAME = 'JONE' "
entityClass - the Class object of BaseEntity which loads the query results.
startPos - starting position in searching records, it begins from 1
endPos - end position in searching records, it begins from 1
Returns:
PageList object, which contains pesistent data which position is between startPos and endPos (greater than or equals startPos, and less than endPos).
Throws:
BaseException

get

public PageList get(java.lang.String pSql,
                    SqlParamMap paramMap,
                    java.lang.Class entityClass,
                    int startPos,
                    int endPos)
             throws BaseException
本方法将给定的SQL装饰成分页查询SQL, 再通过分页查询SQL及参数值取得某段范围(大于等于startPos, 且小于endPos)内的一条或多条记录. 注意：不允许在SQL的WHERE子句中出现某列与子查询返回结果相比较的语句， 例如下面两种类型的SQL是禁用的:
1.SELECT A.COL_1, A.COL_2 FROM A WHERE A.COL_1 = (SELECT B.COL FROM B )
2.SELECT A.COL_1, A.COL_2 FROM A WHERE A.COL_1 IN (SELECT B.COL FROM B ).
请将上面两种被禁用的SQL改成如下形式, 即用EXISTS语句代替子条件语句: 1.SELECT A.COL_1, A.COL_2 FROM A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM B WHERE A.COL_1 =B.COL FROM B )

Decrates the given sql to pager sql, according the pager sql, gets pesistent data which position is between startPos and endPos (greater than or equals startPos, and less than endPos).

Parameters:
pSql - executable sql, such as: "SELECT A.NAME,A.TYPE FROM TABLEXX WHERE A.NAME = ? "
entityClass - the Class object of BaseEntity which loads the query results.
paramMap - SqlParamMap object, which loads the prameter values for the sql.
startPos - starting position in searching records, it begins from 1
endPos - end position in searching records, it begins from 1
Returns:
PageList object, which contains pesistent data which position is between startPos and endPos (greater than or equals startPos, and less than endPos).
Throws:
BaseException
